title: What smartphones are launched in July 2019? - Quora

response.answer_text: Okay so July 2019 was all about budget and mid range smartphones. Real me X Mi k20 pro Oppo k3 Vivo z1 pro These are some of the top launch of this month. And I must admit they are pretty good phones and packs in a lot of new features. But the phone that I liked the most is Realme X because of its price to features comparison. Mi K20 Pro was a much awaited phone from mi brand but it was launched at a starting price of around 22k which is totally insane.
